filecoin_growth_impact:
FIL-denominated transactions enabled: Over 1.5 million FIL in total protocol volume since inception.


Expanded FIL liquidity usage by allowing SPs to reinvest borrowed FIL into sealing operations and storage growth.


Launched FIG token, a governance and incentive layer that drives user participation, yield distribution, and staking rewards.

Supported cross-chain expansion (BNB Chain) to extend FIL’s economic reach and attract external liquidity back into Filecoin.
description: From November 2024 to September 2025, FILLiquid advanced decentralized finance on Filecoin by providing a seamless on-chain lending and staking protocol for Storage Providers (SPs) and FIL holders. Our platform unlocked FIL liquidity for SPs to scale storage capacity, while enabling FIL holders to earn sustainable yield through non-custodial staking. FILLiquid contributed to Filecoin’s real-world utility, driving adoption, capital efficiency, and user engagement across multiple regions. Through continuous community education, partnerships, and transparent growth, we strengthened the Filecoin DeFi ecosystem and reinforced FIL’s role as an active economic asset.
additional_impact:
Strengthened trust and transparency: All transactions and yields are fully on-chain, verified via smart contracts.

Ecosystem alignment: Actively engaged in Filecoin governance and allocator initiatives to connect DeFi and data storage economies.

Community empowerment: FILLiquid established multilingual communities, improving accessibility and global engagement for the Filecoin ecosystem.

Sustainability: Built a recurring value loop — SP borrowing drives FIL demand, FIL staking increases protocol liquidity, and protocol revenue supports FIG stakers — reinforcing long-term ecosystem health.
end_user:
FILLiquid primarily serves Filecoin Storage Providers (SPs) and FIL token holders.
SPs use FILLiquid to borrow FIL and expand their storage operations efficiently.
FIL holders stake their FIL through the protocol to earn yield, participate in governance, and strengthen Filecoin’s decentralized economy.
Additionally, developers and ecosystem partners benefit from the open smart contract infrastructure and transparent on-chain data that FILLiquid contributes.
testimonials:
FILLiquid received positive recognition and support from ecosystem participants, including SPs, builders, and partner projects:
Testimonials and engagement can be found via FILLiquid Twitter/X and Discord Community.
Positive Reviews on Github: https://github.com/filecoin-project/community/discussions/744#discussioncomment-14482098


Notable mentions from Filecoin Plus (Fil+) Allocator Program, where FILLiquid was officially onboarded with an initial 5 PiB DataCap, reflecting trust and recognition within the Filecoin governance community.
https://github.com/filecoin-project/Allocator-Governance/discussions/400
https://github.com/filecoin-project/Allocator-Registry/pull/950

SPs and community developers have publicly endorsed FILLiquid’s impact in improving FIL capital efficiency and liquidity access.

graduations_or_event_attendees:
Hosted and participated in 12+ Filecoin-focused AMAs, Korea Meet-up, and educational sessions across global communities (English, Chinese, Korean)..
Cumulative attendance: 5,000+ participants.
filecoin_addresses_onboarded:
Through our community campaigns, staking tutorials, and onboarding sessions, FILLiquid onboarded over 3,200 new wallet addresses interacting with Filecoin DeFi protocols for the first time. Many participants were converted from educational events, AMAs, and cross-chain campaigns.
https://topweb3.net/FILLiquid/Data.html
https://filscan.io/en/address/0xB153Cb3efF3e7330DDF4962c22aA8DC63B7fa952/#contract_verify
active_devs_increase: FILLiquid’s open DeFi framework has encouraged independent developers to integrate with our protocol through APIs and smart contracts, resulting in 2 new developer collaborations and 2 third-party tool integrations built for FIL staking and monitoring.
